name: packaging production for solid fertiliser or pesticide, per kilogram of packed product | packaging, for fertilisers or pesticides | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/14949/documentation

This dataset represents the production and disposal of packaging material needed to pack 1 kg of dry (solid) fertiliser or pesticide.

This activity starts with the production of the plastic bag for packaging solid fertilisers or pesticides.

Included processes: production of HDPE and stretch blow moulding into plastic bag for packing solid fertilisers or pesticides.
This activity ends with the disposal of waste packaging.
category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

exchanges.description: The reference product represents the production of the packaging material that is needed to store 1 kg of solid fertilisers (or pesticides) in a plastic bag for storing 50 kg of solide fertilsers.

flow.name: packaging, for fertilisers or pesticides
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

exchanges.description: Mass of 1 plastic bag for 50 kg solid fertiliser = 0.100 kg (measured data, Agroscope) which results in 0.002 kg packaging per kg stored fertiliser. The strech blow moulding process requiers 0.00205 kg of HDPE since 1.0 kg product of this process equals 0.976 kg of strech blow plastics.

flow.name: stretch blow moulding
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products

defaultProvider.name: market for stretch blow moulding | stretch blow moulding | Cutoff, U
defaultProvider.category: C:Manufacturing/22:Manufacture of rubber and plastics products/222:Manufacture of plastics products/2220:Manufacture of plastics products
